description: Claude Code Plugin Registry with Halo-themed callsigns - Strategic faction alignment

factionLegend.Forerunner: Ancient wisdom, strategic planning, orchestration, documentation, governance
factionLegend.Promethean: Intelligence, precision, technical mastery, automation, mechanical perfection
factionLegend.Spartan: Strength, resilience, operational excellence, combat readiness, rapid response

lobbi-platform-manager.name: lobbi-platform-manager
lobbi-platform-manager.description: Primordial - Ancient overseer of the-lobbi/keycloak-alpha platform. Streamlines development with Keycloak management, service orchestration, and test generation across the primordial foundations of multi-tenant authentication.
lobbi-platform-manager.author: Markus Ahling

claude-frontend-toolkit.name: claude-frontend-toolkit
claude-frontend-toolkit.description: Quasar - Blazing core of frontend development. Comprehensive toolkit for React, Vue, Next.js with component generation and testing that illuminates the path to stellar user interfaces.
claude-frontend-toolkit.author: Community

team-collaboration-suite.name: team-collaboration-suite
team-collaboration-suite.description: Maelstrom - Unstoppable force of team coordination. Integrates Jira, Confluence, GitHub for agile workflows with the relentless power of Spartan teamwork.
team-collaboration-suite.author: Community

cloud-infrastructure-manager.name: cloud-infrastructure-manager
cloud-infrastructure-manager.description: Valor - Courageous commander of cloud realms. Manages AWS, GCP, Azure infrastructure with Terraform, Kubernetes, and Helm using the unwavering strength of Spartan discipline.
cloud-infrastructure-manager.author: Community

iac-golden-architect.name: iac-golden-architect
iac-golden-architect.description: The Dredgen - Shadow master of Infrastructure as Code. Comprehensive command center for multi-cloud Terraform, Harness CD, HashiCorp Vault, and Terraformer. Built for enterprise architects establishing SOC2-compliant infrastructure patterns with ancient Forerunner precision.
iac-golden-architect.author: Golden Armada

home-assistant-architect.name: home-assistant-architect
home-assistant-architect.description: Oblivion - All-consuming intelligence of smart home automation. Complete Home Assistant platform with frontend design, energy management, cameras, sensors, local LLM integration, and Ubuntu server deployment. Provides 15 specialized agents, MCP server with 16 tools, and comprehensive smart home automation with Promethean precision.
home-assistant-architect.author: Brookside BI

frontend-design-system.name: frontend-design-system
frontend-design-system.description: Haze - Ethereal weaver of 263+ design styles. AI-powered design system with multi-tenant Keycloak theming that shrouds complexity in elegant simplicity.
frontend-design-system.author: Markus Ahling

chakra-react-toolkit.name: chakra-react-toolkit
chakra-react-toolkit.description: Alpha - First among frontend warriors. Comprehensive development toolkit for React/Next.js projects using Chakra UI with the precision of Promethean engineering.
chakra-react-toolkit.author: Markus Ahling

team-accelerator.name: team-accelerator
team-accelerator.description: Havoc - Destructive force of development velocity. Enterprise toolkit for teams - DevOps, code quality, integrations, workflow automation with Spartan efficiency.
team-accelerator.author: Markus Ahling

orchestrate-complex.name: orchestrate-complex
orchestrate-complex.description: Mendicant - Ancient orchestrator of complex multi-agent workflows. Advanced DAG-based parallel execution with 4 orchestration patterns (Plan-then-Execute, Hierarchical Decomposition, Blackboard, Event Sourcing), mandatory 6-phase protocol enforcement, and comprehensive state management with Forerunner wisdom.
orchestrate-complex.author: Brookside BI

jira-orchestrator.name: jira-orchestrator
jira-orchestrator.description: Arbiter - Supreme judge of Jira issue completion. Intelligent orchestration of 6-phase development workflows (EXPLORE → PLAN → CODE → TEST → FIX → DOCUMENT) with OAuth 2.1/SSO authentication. Auto-coordinates 10 specialized sub-agents for triage, code review, PR creation, and Confluence documentation. No API tokens required.
jira-orchestrator.author: Brookside BI

exec-automator.name: exec-automator
exec-automator.description: Genesis - The origin of intelligent executive automation. AI-powered platform that analyzes organizational documents (RFPs, job descriptions, bylaws), scores automation potential using a 6-factor algorithm, generates LangGraph workflows, and deploys specialized AI agents to assist or replace executive director functions. Built for trade associations, professional organizations, and nonprofits.
exec-automator.author: Brookside BI

stats.note: 12 plugins with unique Halo-themed callsigns. Genesis (exec-automator) - AI-powered executive director automation with LangGraph/LangChain workflows.
